Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory610.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'The whole aquarium violently shakes, the structures that support the whole place squeaking disconcertingly.'}
{3: 'Even more worrying are the numerous cracks on the tempered glass that separates the water.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'This place is collapsing!', 4: '1'}
{2: "We're retreating.", 3: '9'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Member A', 3: "We still haven't completed our objectives on the lower third floor and in the west wing. If this is too dangerous for you, you can head for the west wing first. It's disconnected from here, so it shouldn't be affected.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Member A', 3: "We Constructs don't need to worry about drowning, and our comms will still work underwater. We can carry on our mission.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You quickly explain before more of them object.'}
{3: '"You haven\'t equipped the enhanced modules for underwater combat. Fighting in the water will put you at a great disadvantage."'}
{3: '"It is too risky to fight hamstrung if we don\'t know exactly who and what we are fighting."'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The Purifying Force members do not agree or disagree with you. Instead, they all turn to look at Bianca.'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Deploy a drone to the lower third floor. We're retreating afterward.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'One of the members takes out a beetle-shaped drone and sets up a route on the terminal. The drone spreads its wings and flies toward the lower third floor.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Member B', 3: "Just so you know, these drones are designed to track deserters. I have no idea how long it'll last in a place with a high Punishing Virus concentration.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Member B', 3: 'It could send back the intel we need, or it could be infected before it could deliver anything important.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Member B', 3: "There's no way of knowing. We're leaving it to chance...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You all hear a sharp splinter and immediately look for its source...'}
{2: 'Member B', 3: 'And chance has not been on our side.', 4: '1'}

{3: 'As if on cue, you begin to hear the sound of successive crackling and snapping around you. Years of weathering and the impact from the fight just now have finally broken the tempered glass that keeps the water away.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Everyone begins to run. Water breaks through the glass barrier, rushing into the lower second floor.'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'Warning. We have detected a leak at the dolphin show hall. We will be closing it for repair immediately.'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'All guests, please follow the instructions of our staff and leave in an orderly manner.'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'Warning. Drainage groups D2-A to D2-K are offline. Corresponding staff, please troubleshoot the system immediately.'}
{3: 'A large amount of seawater gushes into the dolphin show hall, raising the water level drastically. It quickly reaches your knees, slowing you down significantly.'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'No lifeforms detected inside the dolphin show hall. Initiating lockdown on the venue.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Member C', 3: 'What?! Are you some sort of new Construct?!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The gate to the exit is lowering at a moderate but steady pace. Given how thick it appears, you fear that none of your weapons can open it once it is fully shut.'}
{3: 'Even then, all the Purifying Force members turn to look at you, surprised.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Someone must have tampered with the system here.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'That is when all of you receive a video on your terminals. You glance at it as you run...'}
{3: '...And the Red Tide that has filled the entire space underneath you almost makes you stop.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Member B', 3: 'Chance is on our side, after all.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The member that has been at the back says calmly.'}
{2: 'Member B', 3: "We've managed to dodge a few Hetero-Creatures and capture this before the drone completely fails.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'That member has not looked up this whole time, operating the drone and recording.'}
{2: '(Upload footage to the command center)', 3: '62'}
{2: 'Member B', 3: 'But I guess chance can only take us this far.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: "The gate is nearly closed. You have overclocked your exoskeleton to match the Constructs' speed, but you are all still a long way from the exit."}
{3: 'And there is never just one bad thing that is happening.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory619.jpg', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, please retreat with your team immediately! Water is leaking here as well!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Loud Noise', 3: 'Enemies incoming!'}
{2: 'Lucia, get the refugees and the Purifying Force out of here first.', 3: '73'}
{2: 'Come back with the heavy-duty grinder from the transport craft afterward.', 3: '74'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'The heavy-duty grinder? Commandant, has your location been...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I understand. I will make sure everyone gets out safely. Wait for me.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You nod, looking down at the water that has reached your waist.'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory619.jpg'}
{3: 'After accepting that there is no exiting before the gate closes shut, all of you begin to slow down, and you start calculating how long the small portable oxygen tank you carry will last you.'}
{3: 'The Construct who suggested continuing the mission tosses you a can.'}
{2: 'An oxygen tank?', 3: '85'}

{3: "It is an oxygen tank adorned with children's drawings done with oil markers. The shell is a little rusty, but the equipment itself seems well maintained, even though it looks nothing like what Babylonia gives you."}
{2: 'Member A', 3: "I kept it from my days as a Scavenger. Use this after your oxygen tank runs out, but don't forget to return it afterward.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Construct does not explain too much.'}
{3: 'The Construct does not reply, standing to the side instead. All that is left is the sound of rushing water and the turning gears within the gate.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Member C', 3: 'This is so loud... Huh? Is the gate slowing down?', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Hearing that, you all turn and look.'}
{3: 'The heavy gate was approaching the water unrelentingly, but its signal light has just changed and is now blinking red.'}
{3: 'Following a blaring alarm, the gate stops.'}
{3: 'Right as you wonder if this is another trap laid by the enemy, you hear a frail voice from the broadcast.'}
{2: 'Grace', 3: 'Greetings, Babylonians. My name is Grace. My team and I have stopped the gate from closing.'}
{2: 'Grace', 3: 'We are currently trapped inside the control room on the lower second level. Most of us are too weak to walk. We desperately need your help.'}
{3: 'Although Grace is one of the targets of the investigation, Bianca thought Grace must have been taken by the Red Tide after what she has been through.'}
{3: 'But if Grace is alive, then...'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Is Chiko with you?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Grace', 3: "...I'm sorry. She was standing between the Ascendant and us with her team... All we could do was run..."}
{2: 'Grace', 3: "Our escape route was filled with those monsters, so we've been hiding in the control room... We've run out of food these last few days."}
{2: 'Grace', 3: 'Please save us... Save the children, at least...'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "We'll be there immediately. Please hold on.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Grace', 3: 'Thank you... thanks...'}
{3: 'The voice from the broadcast turns silent.'}
{3: "The Construct who has opposed Bianca's every decision sneers faintly before pulling up the map to the control room and starting to walk."}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'I thought you would oppose it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Member A', 3: "The Vice-Captain would have done the same. She wouldn't have done it out of sympathy like you, though.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Member A', 3: 'That woman recognized us before we presented ourselves, which means she must have seen us through the cameras.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Member A', 3: "She's only speaking up now because she wants us to eliminate those monsters.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Member A', 3: "I don't believe that they have children with them for a second. If we rejected them, however, they would have just threatened us with closing the gate.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Member A', 3: "They're making a move now, probably because they realized that we have a human who can't breathe underwater with us.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Member A', 3: "Don't expect too much from someone who was lured by the Ascendants.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory611.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory619.jpg', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'You explain the change in the situation to Lucia on your way to the control room.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'I see. We will guard the exit until you have returned. The refugees here are going to take a while to retreat.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "They're too fragile, having been trapped for so long.", 4: '1'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory619.jpg'}
{3: "After defeating the few remaining Hetero-Creatures on the way, you reach the control room and hear Grace's voice from the broadcast once again."}
{2: 'Grace', 3: "Hold on. I'll open the door immediately."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "I'll let you do the talking, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You hear the sound of loading guns behind you. Turning around, you find all the Purifying Force members prepared for battle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Member A', 3: 'Just in case.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Construct shrugs.'}
{3: 'Following the sound of its spinning steel axes, the door before you slides open.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A face identical to the one you saw during the briefing appears in front of you.'}
{3: 'Compared to her photo, she looks more exhausted, her lips dry, her eyes sunken.'}
{3: 'Behind her are a few similarly ailing elders, some of whom are unconscious. However...'}
{2: 'Where are the children you mentioned?', 3: '156'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Member A', 3: 'You can drop your act now.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Construct interrupts her rudely.'}
{2: 'Member A', 3: 'Who are we moving?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}

{3: 'The Purifying Force members begin to carry the elderly on their backs. Right then, the aquarium begins to shake violently again, and you hear muffled voices coming from the hallway outside the door.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Scavenger', 3: "Th-they... they're back.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory619.jpg', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Hurry, Commandant. The aquarium appears to be collapsing soon.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "Get out of here, everyone! I'll stop the Hetero-Creatures.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'You too, Commandant.', 4: '2'}
{2: "Alright. Don't stay too far behind.", 3: '176'}
{3: 'You carry the last person and begin treading through the water that has reached your chest, running toward the exit.'}
